label: Spa and Wellness
description: Products and services related to spa and wellness, including skincare, aromatherapy, and relaxation.
intents: Find a spa or wellness center

subcategories.label: Skincare
subcategories.description: Products and services related to skincare, including facials, peels, and microdermabrasion.

subcategories.label: Aromatherapy
subcategories.description: Products and services related to aromatherapy, including essential oils, diffusers, and oil burners.

subcategories.label: Relaxation
subcategories.description: Products and services related to relaxation, including saunas, steam rooms, and foot spas.

subcategories.label: Spa Days and Breaks
subcategories.description: Products and services related to spa days and breaks, including overnight stays and pamper packages.

subcategories.label: Massage and Body Treatments
subcategories.description: Products and services related to massage and body treatments, including hot stone massage and body wraps.
